mapper.insert: insert into payT (pay_no, cont_no, mem_id, businessNum) values (('P'||to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')||'-'||payT_no_seq.nextval), #{cont_no}, #{mem_id}, #{businessNum})
mapper.update: update payT set pay_cost1=#{pay_cost1}, pay_date1=sysdate, pay_state='계약금결제완료' pay_cost2=#{pay_cost2}, pay_date2=sysdate, pay_state='중도금결제완료' pay_cost3=#{pay_cost3}, pay_date3=sysdate, pay_state='잔금결제완료' where cont_no=#{cont_no}
